title: Mississippi Style Roasted Chicken
directions: Lay chicken thighs in the bottom of your slow cooker.
Slice butter and place evenly on top.
(I added about 1/2 cup of water to help wash some of the powdered mixes down and keep them from congealing atop the thighs)...
LikeShow more reactions · Reply · 1 · Yesterday at 7:03pm
Logan Carmichael You can also use a beef roast of similar weight. It would be AWESOME for that, too.

I served it and the juices over a bed of wide egg noodles I sauced-up with some butter, cream cheese, and sour cream and a splash of Worcestershire sauce...basically a homemade cream sauce with some beefy flavor.
ingredients: *1 envelope Au Jus Gravy Mix or Brown Gravy Mix
